name: Undead City: Zombie Survival
description:
You are a super hero who is capable of controlling magic. It's time for you to use the magic that you have learned to save the city. Zombies have spreaded all over the city, they are destroying all the buildings and roads. The army have sent you - the supreme magician - to save the city.

MAIN FEATURES
- Use rotating blades to attack zombies
- Choose the power-ups to support you
- Get a companion - fight drone
- Many levels
- Various zombie types

Please enjoy the game!
